comments: Champion's winnings & consolation amounts matched to Media Fellowship House.

final_jeopardy.answer: James I of England (James VI of Scotland)
final_jeopardy.clue: Macbeth has a vision of a line of 8 Scottish kings, the 8th holding a mirror to reflect this 9th in line who may have been in the audience
